page.title: 13SOCIAL SURVEY,
page.content: {POPULATION. 900,}THE MAJORITY LIVING IN THE VILLAGE PROPER AND THE 'HEATH' {SOCIAL CONCERN.}THE GOOD COMPANIONS,AN OVER 65'S GROUP,MEET MONTHLY.THERE IS A DAY CENTRE IN TENTERDEN WHERE OVER 65'S ARE TAKEN WEEKLY BY MINI-BUS.A CHRISTMAS LUNCH AND A SUMMER OUTING ARE ARRANGED BY THE W.I. COFFEE MORNINGS AND GARDEN PARTIES ARE HELD FOR VARIOUS CHARITIES. {LIFE STYLES}VARY FROM FARMERS,SELF- EMPLOYED,COMUTERS AND MANUAL WORKERS TO RETIRED PUBLIC SERVANTS AND PENSIONERS. {HEALTH}THERE IS A SURGERY WITH DISPENSARY,A DISTRICT NURSE AND THE HOME HELP SERVICE,ALSO MEALS ON WHEELS {LOCAL FACILITIES:}PARISH CHURCH AND METHODIST CHAPEL,A SCHOOL,A VILLAGE HALL AND A RECREATION FIELD WITH TENNIS COURTS AND CHILDREN'S CORNER.
